title: Domian Takeover in [███████]
content:
Summary:
subscription of ████ is expired so any attacker can takeover it
Impact
phishing attacks if any attacker takeovr the domain
steps: Check the domain registration status of ████ to confirm it has expired.
Register the expired domain ████ before any other party does.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an expired domain subscription, which allows any attacker to register and take over the domain. This can lead to phishing attacks if the domain is used maliciously.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires checking the domain's registration status and does not involve complex interactions or multiple components.
